name: Picnic Madness
description:
Picnic Madness is a simple game where you need to defend your cake from various intruders, that are disturbing your picnic on a sunny summer afternoon.

Defend the cake

 ------------------------- 

 Various enemies will try to steal your cake piece by piece, like ants, flies and squirrels. You can kill these enemies by clicking on them either once or multiple times. Occasionally some of their wasp buddies arrive as well, they do not mean any danger to your cake, however they are pretty annoying. After some time they leave you alone, however if you kill them that will hurt a lot, both decreasing your score and stun you a bit. 

 Build your defenses

 ------------------------

 To fight more efficiently against your enemies, you also have the chance to build some defenses around your cake. You can buy these building assets from the money you earn from eliminating your enemies. Some buildings have special powers, that can make the enemies' job harder if you activate them.
